meanings.definition: The fifth and highest card in a suit in card games.
meanings.sent1: In the game, the player was thrilled to draw the quinte and win the round.
meanings.sent2: I was lucky to have the quinte in my hand during the poker game.
meanings.sent3: The quinte card seemed to have a mind of its own, always showing up at the right moment.
meanings.sent4: Her winning strategy relied on the quinte, the card that brought her victory.
meanings.sent5: The quinte card, with its power to change the game, was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A sequence of five consecutive cards in a card game.
meanings.sent1: The player's hand contained a perfect quinte, ensuring a winning streak.
meanings.sent2: During the game, I managed to collect a quinte of hearts.
meanings.sent3: The quinte of spades appeared as if by magic, completing the sequence in my hand.
meanings.sent4: His quinte of diamonds was like a rare gem, bringing him luck in the game.
meanings.sent5: The quinte of clubs completed his hand, leading to a triumphant victory.

meanings.definition: A musical interval spanning five diatonic scale degrees.
meanings.sent1: The musician played a beautiful melody with a perfect quinte in the composition.
meanings.sent2: The quinte in the musical piece added a harmonious touch to the overall sound.
meanings.sent3: The quinte note seemed to dance playfully among the other musical tones.
meanings.sent4: Her voice hit the quinte perfectly, creating a magical moment in the song.
meanings.sent5: The quinte in the music resonated deeply, leaving a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: A type of grape used in winemaking.
meanings.sent1: The winemaker carefully selected the finest quinte grapes for the special blend.
meanings.sent2: The vineyard was known for its exceptional quinte harvest each year.
meanings.sent3: The quinte grapes ripened under the warm sun, ready to be turned into wine.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the quinte grapes filled the winery, promising a delightful wine.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the quinte wine was unmatched, a true delight for the senses.
